name: Possessed (itch) (muzakkiha)
description:
You are playing as a peaceful forest spirit who is currently attacked by a group of dark wisps. Your objective here is to kill as many dark wisps as possible before the time runs out.

. . .   . . .   . . .
But this game is quite different from other shooter games. Your attack will not hurt the enemy, but instead filling the enemy's 'posession meter', which if it is full, then the dark wisp will turn into a light wisp that will follow you and help you damage the enemy. Use them to kill the dark wisps.

This game is my submission for Brackeys Game Jam #2. The game is made alone by myself.  I haven't added the sounds because it turned out that I didn't have the time to make it.
